sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import './write.css' const WriteContainer = styled.div` padding-top: 50px; ` const WriteForm = styled.form` ` const WriteFormGroup = styled.div` margin-left: 150px; display: flex; align-items: center; ` const WriteSubmit = styled.button` ` export default function Write() { return ( Publish ) }
